alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:22PM MST until March 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Kansas, Wichita and Greeley Counties. In Colorado, Cheyenne County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
